mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Reservation ( memberno, type, purpose,departure, arrival, frequency, startdate,enddate, totalmemeber, content) VALUES ( #{memberno}, #{type}, #{purpose}, #{departure}, #{arrival}, #{frequency} ,#{startdate},#{enddate},#{totalmemeber},#{content})
mapper.select: SELECT reservationno, memberno, type, purpose,departure, arrival, frequency, startdate,enddate, totalmemeber, content FROM reservation WHERE reservationno = #{reservationno} AND deleted = '0'
